module.name: Parking Lot
module.description: Manages parking lot extensions and other options. Parking is a way of putting calls "on hold", and then picking them up from any extension.
module.changelog: *12.0.8* FREEPBX-8443 Better descriptions for 12 systems *12.0.7* FREEPBX-8475 Fix Empty Context created *12.0.6* Handle transfers better and fix for bug in asterisk 12 *12.0.5* Fixes for how Asterisk handles parking directly into a slot *12.0.4* Support for new call recording *12.0.3* Get rid of warning message, fixes for Asterisk 12 *12.0.2* FREEPBX-6453 Allows Blind and Attended transfer into specific slot. *12.0.1alpha4* Fixes for recordings when call is picked up, also fix FREEPBX-7129, FREEPBX-7229 *12.0.1alpha3* Using insert_id function from wrapper *12.0.1alpha2* Use genConfig *12.0.1alpha1* Update/Upgrade for Asterisk 12 *2.11.0.14* Using insert_id function from wrapper *2.11.0.13* Changed the specified lines in the files mentioned to add gettext formatting *2.11.0.12* Fixed #6871, Basically dont use Asterisk's built in come back to origin, do it ourselves. Also Fixed #6774, act like the rest of FreePBX *2.11.0.11* Fix typo *2.11.0.10* Add hint for the Parking Lot as a whole *2.11.0.9* Set default destination to terminate call, hangup *2.11.0.8* Add min range to number boxes *2.11.0.7* #6375 proper fix *2.11.0.6* Worked on #6378 Parking Destination and Alternate destination problems, still not perfect. Fixes #6343 *2.11.0.5* Fixes #6375 park retrieve issue and needsreload *2.11.0.4* #6374 sql error updating *2.11.0.3* fix some localization *2.11.0.2* Cleanup of wording *2.11.0.1* Completely rewritten from the ground up. Fixes #5498, #5549 *2.10.0.2* #5901 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.4* #4965, #4972 *2.9.0.3* #4914 *2.9.0.2* #4224 *2.9.0.1* #4740 *2.9.0.0* #4655
